entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gananoque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:28 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grenadier Island 7:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
